title: Naruto: Takigakure no Shitou - Ore ga Eiyuu Dattebayo!
synopsis: After safely escorting the cowardly Takigakure leader Shibuki to his homeland, Naruto Uzumaki, Sasuke Uchiha, and Sakura Haruno are taken aback by the village's sudden invasion of rogue ninjas. As their teacher Kakashi Hatake had departed for Konohagakure beforehand, the team is left to deal with the attacking forces on their own.
related_anime: ['Naruto: Takigakure no Shitou Ore ga Hero dattebayo!', 'Naruto']
